name: WILSON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Borough of Wilson, and Northampton County, Petitioners, v. EASTON HOSPITAL, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Wilson Area School District v. Easton Hospital
docket_number: Petition No. 0120 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1998

parties: WILSON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Borough of Wilson, and Northampton County, Petitioners, v. EASTON HOSPITAL, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of August, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, limited to the following issue:
Does Respondent operate entirely free from private profit motive as required by Hospital Utilization Project v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, 507 Pa. 1, 487 A.2d 1306 (1985), for purposes of tax-exempt status?
This case is consolidated with Pinnacle Health Hospitals v. Dauphin County Bd. of Assessment Appeals, et al., 552 Pa. 199, 713 A.2d 1142, for purposes of oral argument.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Donald F. Spry, II, Bangor, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
713 A.2d 1143
WILSON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Borough of Wilson, and Northampton County, Petitioners, v. EASTON HOSPITAL, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 7, 1998.
Donald F. Spry, II, Bangor, for petitioner.
